tasks.label: make blog post
tasks.command: title="${input:blogTitle}" && date=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) && filename="${date}-$(echo $title | tr ' ' '-')".md && touch _posts/$filename && echo "---" >> _posts/$filename && echo "layout: post" >> _posts/$filename && echo "title:  \"$title\"" >> _posts/$filename && echo "date:   $date" >> _posts/$filename && echo "categories: jekyll update" >> _posts/$filename && echo "---" >> _posts/$filename
